definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: If there is a dietician guides you to improve your diet habit, would it be healthier than before?
sentences.chinese: 如果有营养师指导你的饮食，会否对你的健康有帮助？

sentences.english: Will the "criticism right" of the head teacher worsen the "violent education"?
sentences.chinese: 班主任的“批评权”会否加剧“暴力教育”？

sentences.english: It is unclear whether China will totally phase out production of incandescents.
sentences.chinese: 中国会否全面叫停白炽灯生产尚不明确。

sentences.english: With more popular use of credit cards and Octopus cards, do you bring less cash when going out?
sentences.chinese: 八达通及信用卡的普遍会否令你带少了现金上街？

sentences.english: When asked if she would give some gifts to Guo Fucheng?
sentences.chinese: 问她会否买礼物送给绯闻男友郭富城？

sentences.english: Can a strong urge to urinate impair your ability to drive?
sentences.chinese: 一股强烈的小便欲望会否影响你的驾驶能力？

sentences.english: Would mass e-interaction bog down the White House?
sentences.chinese: 互联网上的互动会否让白宫陷入困顿？

sentences.english: I am worried if the poet could be incised wound by the paper’s edge.
sentences.chinese: 我担心诗人会否被生活的纸锋割伤。

sentences.english: Those that are not are certain to use altitude chambers to prepare.
sentences.chinese: 不太确定会否使用高空模拟室来准备。

sentences.english: Do your children bring toys out?
sentences.chinese: 你的小朋友会否带玩具出街玩？

sentences.english: When you make purchases on the snacks, do you consciously check where the snacks are made?
sentences.chinese: 当你购买零食时，会否特别留意其产地？

sentences.english: Are In-Store Shops a Problem for Department Stores?
sentences.chinese: 店中店会否成为百货商店的累赘？

sentences.english: Could it be true that a milkman now holds the key to the outcome of the 2009 world championship?
sentences.chinese: 那么送奶工的客户会否真的成为2009世界冠军呢？

sentences.english: Would HKUPOP conduct popularity surveys on Anson Chan and Regina Ip?
sentences.chinese: 民研计划会否对陈方安生和叶刘淑仪进行民望调查？

sentences.english: In Q12-13, do you reduce the internet banking service rate after the problem?
sentences.chinese: 以上的选择会否减少您对网上银行服务的使用率？

sentences.english: Various analogies have been propounded in this respect, some of which have been fairly traditional.
sentences.chinese: 有各种类比，会否在这方面，其中有些是相当传统的。

definition: (posing a question: whether sb, something) can or cannot?/is able to or not
whether or not/can it or can't it/is it possible?
what course to follow/what path to take
auxiliary verb introducing future action: may (be able to)/will (cause)/should (enable)/going to
